[cliff.formatter.list]
html = clifftablib.formatters:HtmlFormatter
json = clifftablib.formatters:JsonFormatter
yaml = clifftablib.formatters:YamlFormatter

[cliff.formatter.show]
html = clifftablib.formatters:HtmlFormatter
json = clifftablib.formatters:JsonFormatter
yaml = clifftablib.formatters:YamlFormatter
